name: Jill's day DEMO English Ver
description:
Please note that there is in game audio. If you hear no sound when playing on a smartphone, please check your phone's volume and silent/vibrate mode settings.

◇Method of operation◇

keyboard:
[Move, Select]
　Up - Up Arrow / W  
　Down - Down Arrow / S  
　Left - Left Arrow / A  
　Right - Right Arrow / D
[Interact]
　A - Alt / Z / J 
[Cancel, Back]
　B - Ctrl / K / X 
　Press and hold the B button to speed up the message.

Start - Enter   (not used)
Select - Shift  (not used)

It seems that controllers such as Xbox can also be used.

◇Information◇

Currently, it is only in Japanese.(We are looking for translators.)
The Japanese version is here.

◇Message◇

This is a trial version of the VA-11 Hall-A derivative game being produced at GB Studio. There are no riddles to solve or flags to raise, so please enjoy the pixel art, BGM, and conversations.

There are still few events and conversations, but I will do my best to complete it! We would appreciate it if you could give us any problems, ideas or impressions. We are also looking for people who can cooperate with graphics, songs, and scenarios.
